    Home

    Welcome

    Hello and welcome, my name is Guy Carter-Richardson and currently live in York, North Yorkshire, UK. I am currently studying a PhD within the Nuclear Astrophysics Group at the University of York. I have recently left employment in the British Army where I served for six and half years as an Officer in the Royal Signals.

    The ongoing PhD is focussed on understanding nuclear formation within stars, specifically CNO breakout reactions.

    Thankyou for visiting, and please feel free to get in touch via any of the methods detailed in the Contact page.

    Content

    On this website, you'll find a range of content that reflects my interests:

    • Computer Projects: Mostly ROOT, GEANT4 and NPTool.
    • Electronical Projects: Based around Arduinos, Raspberry Pis and breadboards.
    • Physics Projects: Sometimes related to the ongoing PhD project.

    Then, other elements also included:

    • About: A bit of background.
